text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President chairs a cabinet meeting in which Iraq welcomes outcome of Arab foreign ministers' meeting in Cairo.
- A large Turkish delegation arrives in Baghdad.
- Iraq will start distributing new food rations from April.
- A vessel loaded with 37,240 tonnes of wheat docks at Umm Qasr port.
(The above were also carried by QADISSIYA and JUMHOURIYA)
- Trade Ministry will distribute flour to civil servants.
